name: FrankenGhost
description:
WARNING: ***WHEN GAME STARTS, GO TO OPTIONS TO TURN MUSIC ON***

Explore the maze and solve the diabolical puzzles of Dr. Franken. You control Frank - the monster.

Electricity makes you move. If you stop moving... you die! No worries though! You can still be a ghost!

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
Space - Jump
Z/Left Control - Pickup and Throw blocks / Possess Objects
